email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well.

Following our discussion, I am pleased to offer the following for your shipment of steel coils:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON (DWT 45,000, LOA 190m)
Freight: USD 85/MT
Laycan: 15-20 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

This offer is firm for 24 hours. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. USD 85/MT seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you revise the rate to USD 78/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam?

Best regards,
Emily Wilson
SteelCo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can adjust the rate to USD 80/MT, which is the best I can offer at this time. The vessel's ETA at Rotterdam is 14 November, subject to weather conditions.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 80/MT is still higher than our target. If you can stretch the laycan to 18-23 November, could you consider USD 75/MT?

Regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Given the revised laycan, I can agree to USD 77/MT. This is my final offer. Please confirm your acceptance at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 77/MT is acceptable. Please send over the recap for our records.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for confirming. Please find the recap below:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 77/MT
Laycan: 18-23 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers
